meta.title: Alles Gut - Your digital sign of life
meta.description: The personal safety app. With regular check-ins, you give your loved ones peace of mind.

hero.description: Alles Gut is your personal safety app. With regular check-ins, you give your loved ones peace of mind - and they are automatically notified if you don't check in.

features.title: Features
features.secureCheckInsDesc: Simple confirmation with one tap. Your digital sign of life.
features.emergencyContactsDesc: Up to 5 trusted people who will be notified.
features.encryptedDesc: Your data stays private. Highest security standards.
features.gdprDesc: Fully compliant with European data protection regulations.
features.pauseDesc: Pause check-ins when you're busy. Strictly limited to 24 hours.
